column4: I still have access to my router. Is there a reason why one of my hosts can't use the internet?
is it only your ubuntu / new update of ubuntu that doesnt work?
the user says it was flakey all day
If you can get a dhcp addr i would imagine it is a problem with the network, not the client. (but im usually wrong about anything linux)
haha, well I _am_ in #ubuntu asking this question, aren't I? =p
But I WILL set it to dhcp instead and try that
what do you use for DHCP on your network
Well, I think on ANY network, dhcp give the computer a randomly generated Ip address.
right, but most you can configure
AH, well if that is true, I have no idea.
the default windows one lets you map MACs to IPs
alright, setting it to dhcp worked. Any reason why static DIDN'T work that you can think of?
